
{{Client function}}
This function allows you to set the camera's view mode if you are inside a [[/vehicle.md|vehicle]]. This indicates at what distance the camera will follow the player.

==Syntax==
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
bool setCameraViewMode ( int viewMode )
</syntaxhighlight>

===Required Arguments===
*'''viewMode''': The view mode you wish to use
{{Camera view modes}}

===Returns===
Returns ''true'' if the view was set correctly, ''false'' otherwise.

==Example==
This example sets the camera to bumper view when the local player enters any vehicle.
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
addEventHandler("onClientPlayerVehicleEnter", localPlayer, function()
  setCameraViewMode(0)
end)
</syntaxhighlight>
